Question: Jiangmen Hongli Energy co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jiangmen Hongli Energy Co., Ltd.

Product: 3V LiMnO2 Cylindrical Batteries

- High emphasis on safety, environmental considerations, quality, and technology
- Sustainable energy solutions promoting zero-CO2 society and renewable energy adoption
- Wide range of in-vehicle device solutions for electric vehicles (EVs)
- Air-to-Water Heat Pump for environmentally friendly heating
- Development of high-performance electrodes for green hydrogen production
- Central air conditioning system for comfortable and clean air environment
- Distributed Energy Resource Management System for managing green energy
- Renewable energy solution using hydrogen fuel cell generators
- V2H Storage Battery System for simultaneous charging and discharging
- Perovskite Solar Cells for integrating solar power into unconventional spaces
- Circular economy initiatives to minimize resource use and extend product life
- Plastic reduction, products recrafted, and resource recycling efforts
- Bio CO2 crop growth technology and kinari™ resin development
- Initiatives to reduce food waste and promote healthy food culture
- Various personal care products for self-care and comfort
- Technics audio equipment and advanced composite materials
- Metaverse products including wireless full-body trackers and VR headsets
Summary_cn:
江门弘力能源股份有限公司。

产品：3V 锂锰石墨 2 号圆柱形电池

- 高度重视安全、环境、质量和技术
- 可持续能源解决方案，促进零二氧化碳社会和可再生能源的采用
- 为电动汽车提供广泛的车载设备解决方案
- 环境友好型热水泵提供供暖服务
- 开发高性能电极用于绿色氢能生产
- 提供舒适洁净的中央空调系统
- 分布式能源资源管理系统，用于管理绿色能源
- 使用氢燃料电池发电机的可再生能源解决方案
- V2H 储能电池系统，实现同时充电和放电
- 钙钛矿太阳能电池，将太阳能融入非传统空间
- 循环经济倡议，以最小化资源使用和延长产品寿命
- 减少塑料消耗，产品再造和资源回收的努力
- 生物二氧化碳作物生长技术和 kinari™ 树脂开发
- 降低食物浪费，推广健康饮食文化的倡议
- 各种个人护理产品，提供自我关怀和舒适
- Technics 音频设备和先进复合材料
- 具有无线全身追踪器和虚拟现实头盔的元宇宙产品
